item.title: How To Watch Movies And TV Shows On PC
item.description: VPN It is better to use VPN to stream videos. I would recommend NordVPN. It costs about 3.5 C$/month. It could increase the speed and it is also good for security and privacy. It will also allow you to watch Netflix & Amazon Prime videos which are not available in your country. Netflix & Amazon Prime You can find a list of Movies and TV-shows available on Netflix & Amazon Prime on JustWatch.
